column4: Good Day :) I want to format my pendrive, i have tried to manipulate it with fdisk and with mkfs but none of this work, they keep prompting: "mkfs.vfat: unable to open /dev/sdb1
" How can i change the permissions of my drive to format it?
hey NKjoep if you have a question ask :)
thank you, but i have no questions :) just here to chat
